node.value: Developed game strategies, analyzed opponent patterns, and prepared teams for high-level competition

badminton-coaching.title: Badminton Coaching Leadership
badminton-coaching.content:
Led coaching for 8 different badminton teams at competitive city level, developing
leadership skills, teaching abilities, and team management experience that directly
translates to software development team dynamics.Studied effective coaching and teaching methodologies, sports psychology, and
team motivation techniques to become a more effective leader.Successfully managed and coordinated practice schedules, competitions, and development plans for 8 teamsCreated personalized training programs for players at different skill levels and tracked progressDeveloped game strategies, analyzed opponent patterns, and prepared teams for high-level competitionLed teams to compete successfully at the highest level in local city competitions,
with several teams achieving top placements.The leadership and analytical skills developed in sports coaching directly apply to
software development team leadership and code review processes.
